title: San Francisco/SoMa
name: San Francisco Museum of Modern Art (SFMOMA)
directions: across the street from the Yerba Buena Gardens
hours: ''Currently closed for major renovations and expansion of the building, which is scheduled to be complete in early 2016; see the website for temporary exhibits set up around the Bay Area''
content: An innovative art museum with five floors of galleries featuring changing exhibitions as well as permanent displays featuring the works of some very famous 20th century artists, including Georgia O'Keeffe, Pablo Picasso, Salvador Dal√≠, and many others. Be sure to see the unique glass bridge on the 5th floor, perched high above the main lobby.
